content:
Hi, welcome to my website! I am a Research Economist in the Monetary Policy Analysis Division at the Swiss National Bank, and a PhD candidate at the University of Zurich. My research covers derivative and bond markets, as well as the real effects of credit market imperfections. Previously, I was a consultant at Frontier Economics in London, where I specialized in Financial Services. Outside work, I enjoy martial arts and beautiful hikes.
Disclaimer: This is my own website. The views expressed here are solely my own and do not reflect those of the Swiss National Bank.
